articles.content: AppleInsider is supported by its audience and may earn commission as an Amazon Associate and affiliate partner on qualifying purchases. These affiliate partnerships do not influence our editorial con… [+1669 chars]

articles.author: Brian Ashcraft
articles.title: Final Fantasy XIV Endwalker Players Mourn Blocky Grapes - Kotaku
articles.description: On December 20, 2021, FFXIV said goodbye to some purple blocky grapes
articles.content:
Pour out some pixelated wine for Final Fantasy XIV Endwalkers purple grapes. The latest updatePatch 6.01has smoothed out their angular edges and made them far less blocky.
